entities.name: azkaban
entities.description: Azkaban is mentioned as a place where someone can be released from.

entities.name: morfin
entities.description: Morfin is mentioned as the person who was affected by Voldemort's magic.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as the one who did magic on Morfin.

entities.name: ministry
entities.description: The Ministry is mentioned as an organization that makes decisions and has a role in detecting magic.

entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is mentioned as the one who cast a Hover Charm.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the person asking questions and expressing indignation.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as a person who explains how the Ministry works.

relationships.description: The Ministry failed to detect that Voldemort was responsible for the magic done on Morfin.
Harry was blamed by the Ministry for a magic spell cast by Dobby.
The Ministry failed to detect that Harry was not responsible for the magic spell.
